name: Line Up the Dots
description:
Line Up the Dots is a minimalist puzzle game. Your goal is to rearrange the dots to match the pattern presented to you. You may undo your swipes if you made a mistake, but the number of moves is limited. Each puzzle may be played more than once with different outcome. You may use hints to help you get started, but be careful not to run out of them before your puzzle is finished! Levels start simple and progress until your mind is really put to test.

Keep your mind sharp and have fun playing with colorful dots!

Features:
• hundreds of colorful puzzles
• available in English, French and Russian
• hours of brain-teasing gameplay

Please note: Line Up the Dots is completely free to play, but you can also purchase some items within the game for real money. Disable in-app purchases on your device if you don't want to use this feature.
